description: This document from May 2010, redacted in places, is one of several undisclosed classified documents provided by Edward J. Snowden, the former N.S.A contractor, and shared by The New York Times, The Guardian and ProPublica.
title: From Britain’s Government Communications Headquarters
title_page: From Britain’s Government Communications Headquarters - The New York Times
maintext:
Spy Agencies Tap Data Streaming From Phone Apps
As personal data pour onto mobile networks, American and British eavesdroppers are prying into so-called leaky apps to extract geographical data, address books and phone logs, secret documents show.
